title: Janet Jackson, 53, beams as she makes her way through NYC's JFK airport
text:
Janet Jackson kept warm in a cozy ensemble as she was snapped at New York City's JFK Airport Tuesday.

The 53-year-old was clad in a burnt orange puffer jacket with black sweatpants and black Converse high-top sneakers, with glasses and a black beanie over her curly reddish locks.

She was later spotted without the jacket, donning a long-sleeved black sweater on the autumn evening in the Big Apple.

Out and about: Janet Jackson, 53, kept warm in a cozy ensemble as she was snapped at New York City's JFK Airport Tuesday

The Grammy-winning artist has been touring to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Janet Jackson's Rhythm Nation 1814, her top-selling album that spawned a series of hits including the title track, Miss You Much, Escapade, Come Back to Me and Love Will Never Do (Without You).

She has a trio of concerts in Hawaii's Blaisdell Center next month planned in commemoration of the album, which is the only in history to produce seven singles that hit the top five on the Billboard Hot 100 charts, according to the outlet.

Jackson was previously among the ranks of big names who had done Las Vegas residencies with her Metamorphosis show at the Park MGM, which ran from May to August earlier this year.

The sister of the late Michael Jackson has amassed one of the most impressive resumes in entertainment, as she's also won two Emmys, a Golden Globe and multiple honors across the musical spectrum.

Travel day: Janet was clad in a burnt orange puffer jacket with black sweatpants and black Converse high-top sneakers, with glasses and a black beanie over her curly reddish locks

Luxe life: Her sister La Toya was snapped in LA in a sleek, stylish ensemble

Fashionista: The entertainer donned a black top with designer jeans and a bold gold belt by Guccim with an off-white hat and black boots

She was nominated for an Oscar for 1993 ballad Again from the drama Poetic Justice, which she made with late legends John Singleton and Tupac Shakur.

While Janet was in the East Coast, her sister LaToya Jackson, 63, was snapped in Los Angeles Tuesday.

The entertainer donned a black top with designer jeans and a bold gold belt by Gucci as she was snapped on errands in the City of Angels.
description: The Grammy-winning artist has been touring to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Janet Jackson's Rhythm Nation 1814.
